programme.title: Charlie Moore: No Offense
programme.desc: Fishing enthusiast Charlie Moore, also known as "The Mad Fisherman," is stepping out of his comfort zone and into the worlds of his guests, but first they have to visit his. In each episode, a special guest is invited into Charlie's world, and then the roles are reversed. When it's his turn, Charlie immerses himself in the local culture of the town he visits, wanting to experience everything that makes it special, from the best places to eat to favorite fishing destinations, and nobody is safe from his comedic critiquing.

programme.desc: A daily show featuring conversational debate that sets up the day in Boston sports. The format incorporates social media and timely guests to inform and entertain fans of New England sports teams.

programme.title: Bet Sweats
programme.desc: Featuring two of the sharpest bettors in the game, Joe Ostrowski and Sam Panayotovich bring unmatched expertise. This show is a can't-miss for any sports or betting fan looking for actionable insights, bold predictions, and high-stakes entertainment.
